headers.name: Content-Type
headers.description: Send JSON object to use the API Web Services

headers.name: X-chkp-sid
headers.description: Session unique identifier as it returned by the login request

body.name: top
body.description: Add rule on top of specific section identified by uid or name

body.name: layer
body.description: Layer that holds the Object. Identified by the Name or UID.

body.name: destination
body.description: Collection of Network objects identified by Name or UID that represents connection destination.

body.name: service
body.description: Collection of Network objects identified by Name or UID that represents connection service.

body.name: source
body.description: Collection of Network objects identified by Name or UID that represents connection source.

body.name: blade
body.description: Blades for HTTPS Inspection. Identified by Name or UID of the blade.

body.name: certificate
body.description: Internal Server Certificate identified by Name or UID, otherwise, "Outbound Certificate" is a default value.

body.name: destination-negate
body.description: TRUE if "negate" value is set for Destination.

body.name: install-on
body.description: Which Gateways identified by the name or UID to install the policy on.

body.name: service-negate
body.description: TRUE if "negate" value is set for Service.

body.name: site-category
body.description: Collection of Site Categories objects identified by the name or UID.

body.name: site-category-negate
body.description: TRUE if "negate" value is set for Site Category.

body.name: source-negate
body.description: TRUE if "negate" value is set for Source.

add-https-rule with custom fields.request:
POST {{server}}/add-https-rule
Content-Type: application/json
X-chkp-sid: {{session}}

{
  "layer" : "Default Layer",
  "name" : "Second Rule",
  "position" : 1,
  "source" : "host1",
  "destination" : "host2",
  "service" : "https",
  "action" : "Bypass",
  "site-category" : "alcohol",
  "blade" : "IPS"
}

add-https-rule with custom fields with l.request:
POST {{server}}/add-https-rule
Content-Type: application/json
X-chkp-sid: {{session}}

{
  "layer" : "Default Layer",
  "name" : "Third Rule",
  "position" : 1,
  "source.1" : "host1",
  "source.2" : "host2",
  "destination.1" : "host3",
  "destination.2" : "host4",
  "service.1" : "https",
  "service.2" : "Web_Proxy",
  "action" : "Inspect",
  "site-category.1" : "alcohol",
  "site-category.2" : "education",
  "blade.1" : "IPS",
  "blade.2" : "Content Awareness",
  "blade.3" : "Data Loss Prevention"
}
